changeSet.author: Vinay
Vinay
Vinay
changeSet.sql: update ExtendedFieldDetail set fieldmandatory=1 where moduleid in (select moduleid from ExtendedFieldHeader where modulename='COLLATERAL' and submodulename='ADFL') and fieldname='CARPETAREA';

changeSet.author: Vinay
Vinay
changeSet.createView: SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode FROM legalapplicantdetails t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city

changeSet.author: Vinay
changeSet.createView: SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode FROM legalapplicantdetails_temp t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city UNION ALL SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode FROM legalapplicantdetails t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM legalapplicantdetails_temp WHERE legalapplicantdetails_temp.legalapplicantid = t1.legalapplicantid))

changeSet.author: Vinay
Vinay
changeSet.createView: SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode, t1.AddrLine1, t1.AddrLine2 FROM legalapplicantdetails t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city

changeSet.author: Vinay
changeSet.createView: SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode, t1.AddrLine1, t1.AddrLine2 FROM legalapplicantdetails_temp t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city UNION ALL SELECT t1.legalapplicantid, t1.legalid, t1.title, t1.propertyownersname, t1.age, t1.relationshiptype, t1.idtype, t1.idno, t1.remarks, t1.version, t1.lastmntby, t1.lastmnton, t1.recordstatus, t1.rolecode, t1.nextrolecode, t1.taskid, t1.nexttaskid, t1.recordtype, t1.workflowid, t2.doctypedesc AS idtypename, t1.customerid, t1.relationshipname, t1.country, t1.statecode, t1.citycode, t1.pincode, t1.AddrLine1, t1.AddrLine2 FROM legalapplicantdetails t1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.idtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT JOIN bmtcountries t4 ON t1.country = t4.countrycode LEFT JOIN rmtcountryvsprovince t5 ON t1.statecode = t5.cpprovince AND t1.country = t5.cpcountry LEFT JOIN rmtprovincevscity t6 ON t1.citycode = t6.pccity AND t1.statecode = t6.pcprovince AND t1.country = t6.pccountry LEFT JOIN pincodes t7 ON t1.pincode = t7.pincode AND t1.citycode = t7.city WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM legalapplicantdetails_temp WHERE legalapplicantdetails_temp.legalapplicantid = t1.legalapplicantid))
